desc:
Please would you make a case editor available on the MBOD system whereby an admin user can search for a data record, see the image and data captured and then make changes as necessary. Once saved, the data record should be saved to the database and the history of the case should reflect the changes made and by whom the changes were made.

I would like to be able to search on as many fields as possible to call up a case.

Logged by Neil
name: CW - CCW395 - Case Editor - Mbod
